title: Strands
description: Claremorris Gallery, Nov 20th to Dec 20th 2021. Strands features sixteen new works by Irish painter, Donald Teskey, mostly created in County Mayo during the summer of 2021.

title: Mapping the Periphery
description: Oliver Sears Gallery is delighted to reopen with Mapping the Peripheral, an exhibition of new paintings by Donald Teskey.

title: Haven to Haven
description: For more than two decades, Donald Teskey has visited West Cork, drawn to its embracing, sometimes dramatic landscapes of sea edges, harbour towns, mountains, forests, farms and waterways.
